div.p: Sorry, this product is not available anymore.
Immersion gold area is smaller than 30%, if over this value ,pls offer detail。

t.t-if: silkscreen_color != 'Matt Blue' and silkscreen_color != 'Matt green' and silkscreen_color != 'Matt black' and silkscreen_color != 'Transparent'

option.t-att: ['selected' if not surface and not immersion_gold_thickness else 'data-cpo', '']

div.t-att-class: 'col-md-12 col-sm-12 cpo-tips-content' if immersion_gold_thickness else 'col-md-12 col-sm-12 cpo-tips-content cpo-none'
div.p: Immersion gold area is smaller than 30%, if over this value ,pls offer detail。

div.t-att-class: 'form-group cpo-finger-box' if cpo_gold_thick else 'form-group cpo-finger-box cpo-none'
